title: S12 Ep192: A Season with the Witch & The Hallowed Haunts of Edgar Allan Poe
itunes:title: A Season with the Witch & The Hallowed Haunts of Edgar Allan Poe
description:
What is it like to live in America's Witch Capital for the entire month of October? JW Ocker immersed his family into the culture of Salem, MA for 31 days to explore it's Mysteries & Histories plus a look at the short bizarre life of Edgar Allan Poe.

Oddthingsiveseen.com
